rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Spacious entry with a ramp for wheelchair accessibility and adherence to Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open-plan living area with floor-to-ceiling windows ensuring natural light; designed following local building norms and luxury aesthetics.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Integrated dining space within the living area promoting social interaction, accessible design, and Vastu alignment.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen with ergonomic layout for wheelchair access, incorporating local norms and sustainable design features.

rooms.name: Guest Toilet
rooms.description: Accessible guest toilet adhering to local building codes and Vastu guidelines.

openings.description: Wheelchair-accessible main door with ramp leading into the entrance hall.
Floor-to-ceiling window providing ample natural light and panoramic views.
Access to a spacious balcony designed for relaxation and wheelchair access where possible.

openings.location: Corner of Living Room and Kitchen
openings.description: Staircase with handrails, designed to allow easy transition between levels while meeting safety regulations.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom A
rooms.description: Luxury bedroom with a spacious balcony and floor-to-ceiling windows ensuring privacy and ample natural light; designed for wheelchair accessibility.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom B
rooms.description: Comfortable guest bedroom with a dedicated balcony, ensuring adherence to Vastu principles and luxury finishes.

rooms.name: Bedroom C
rooms.description: Additional bedroom space with a balcony; designed for wheelchair access in compliance with local building norms.

rooms.name: Bathroom A
rooms.description: Master en-suite bathroom featuring grab bars and accessible fixtures to ensure user safety and comfort.

openings.description: Access to a spacious balcony with luxury finishes and wheelchair-friendly design.
Floor-to-ceiling window ensuring privacy while maximizing natural light.

openings.location: Corner of Master Bedroom A and Bathroom A
openings.description: Well-designed staircase with railings that meets accessibility guidelines and safety standards.

rooms.name: Private Study
rooms.description: Luxurious study area featuring ample natural light from floor-to-ceiling windows and adhering to Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Additional Storage/Utility Room
rooms.description: Functional space for storage or utility purposes designed with accessibility in mind.

openings.description: Accessible balcony door ensuring a seamless connection between indoor and outdoor spaces.
Floor-to-ceiling window for natural light, following local norms and Vastu guidelines.
